Description: Defines how each origin type interacts with damage types and effects

column9: Often energy beings; immune to most

Description: Always check origin.bleeds before applying bleeding status
Constructs take full damage but show sparks/smoke instead of blood
Divine beings "bleed" golden ichor - cosmetic difference same mechanics
Use Alien_Physiology_Examples as templates; custom aliens can vary
Match death visual to final damage type that killed the character
Bleeding from multiple sources stacks; burning does not (refreshes duration)
Characters with 50%+ cybernetics count as PARTIAL for bleeding
